ags:resource.dc:title: Optimasi inseminasi buatan pada kerbau lumpur (Bubalus bubalis) melalui teknik sinkronisasi estrus dan ovulasi

dc:title.dcterms:alternative: Optimizing artificial insemination on swamp buffalo (Bubalus bubalis) through synchronization of estrus and ovulation

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: Artificial insemination (AI) program in swamp buffalo will be more efficienct by implementing synchronization of estrus and ovulation. By synchronizing of ovulation, AI can be done at a fixed time schedule without concerning to estrus detection. Gonadotropin releasing hormone (GnRH) and human chorionic gonadotropin (hCG) have been used in protocols of estrus synchronization to induce ovulation. A study of AI in swamp buffalo was conducted on 83 buffaloes to evaluate the impact of protocol of estrus synchronization of reproductive efficiency of swamp buffalo. The three protocols used were Ovsynch (GnRH-PGF2 alpha-GnRH-AI), convensional (PGF2 alpha - PGF 2 alpha - AI) and select-synch (GnRH alpha - PGF2 alpha - AI). Inducing of ovulation were done by administration of GnRH or hCG after prostaglandin (PGF2 alpha) injection. AI was done at 18 and 24 hour after the second GnRH injection (66 hours and 72 hours after PGF2 alpha injection) for ovsynch method and 72 hours after last PGF2 alpha injection for conventional and Select-synch methods. Parameters observed were percentage of estrus and pregnancy from the three estrus synchronization protocols and the differences were analysed by statistics. All of buffaloes (100 percent) in the three synchronization protocols showed estrus behavior prior to AI. The percentage of pregnancy was 64.71

77.14 and 83.87 percent for the ovsynch, conventional and select-synch respectively and there was no significantly different (P > 0.05) among the three protocols, hCG administration after the last PGF2 alpha also did not affect pregnancy rate, ie: 76.47 vs 77.78 percent (with hCG vs without hCG) for the conventional and 88.24 vs 78.57 percent for the select-synch. It is concluded that the synchronization of estrus protocols in this study can synchronize the estrous and ovulation and AI can be done in a fixed-timed and could reach better pregnancy rate of swamp buffalo.
